name: Combat Project
description:
I took a Scripting class Fall 2019 at the University of Texas. This was the second project for the semester. Here is the assignment details:

Project Requirements:

  • May be 2D or 3D (find assets on the Asset Store)
  • Playable character that has animations for moving and attacking
    • Use NavMesh for either the player or the enemies
    • You may use a standard Unity character controller
  • At least 3 enemies, visually distinct
  • At least one of each: ranged attack, melee attack (can be either the player's attack or an enemy's attack)
  • Enemies must detect and attack the player based on distance or sight line
  • Visual indicator for player targeting specific enemy
  • Health indicator for player and enemies
  • Enemies play death animations when they die
